definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: √ of foll. (NH [[כִּרְכֵּר]] use circumlocution; Targum. pl. [[כִּרְכְּרָן]] dances; Ar. kar=a return, repeat, attack anew, advance and retreat; karkara id.; II. whirl about; orig. perh. move around, then surround, enclose, recur, etc.; Eth. karkara: turn a mill, only pt.; kurkur: v. rotate, revolve, roll, and deriv. Di:838 f.);—only
